TopicTitle: Roving Laythe (Dedicated to the Curiosity 1 Year Anniversary)

Articles.Content:
I made this Screenshot and edited it in Photoshop to make it look like a real picture, I did this cause It's a Year since the Curiosity landing on Mars!

The numbers are Random on the top left. They didn't mean anything specific, I literally Mashed the Number pad.
yeah cant wait until the next nasa rover

if there is a next with all the funding cuts.

Nice photoshopping.
It's sad to think that isn't it... We have all these cuts on Space Programs, When they shouldn't even need funds. It's for Education, Exploration and of course, possibly even Colonization.

There will be a next rover. There must be a next rover. Either we expand into space... or we die.

Philosophy aside, nice pic!
